overview: A pair of female devils (Devi Ivonne, Tanty Noriesta) kidnap men, rape and kill them.  Their teacher who gave a warning, was killed.  Meanwhile, the Trident Golden Spear, a royal heirloom, was stolen by Dewa Thief (Tanaka) on orders from Rana Blambang (K. Supranto), the son of a concubine who wanted to seize the throne.  The God of Thieves kept the original, and the fake was handed over.  His dream of becoming king by owning the heirloom was dashed, because a pair of female devils stole it.  Then came Wiro Sableng (Tonny Hidayat) to fix all the problems, return the heirloom to the Palace, then wander again.
title: Pair of Female Demons
